replies.context: You could easily avoid this if you don't assault anyone or otherwise break the law.

He could have avoided it if he'd gone to work to support those 7 kids instead of harassing people who he doesn't know over something that's not his business.
He could have avoided the interaction with his 12 yo kid by playing ball with him in the park instead of dragging him into a potentially dangerous situation.
Best of all, instead of staying outside the Planned Parenthood clinic, he could have gone inside and said "My wife REALLY needs me to get a vasectomy".
You can also easily avoid this if you execute your violence in the name of Jane’s Revenge, Ruth Sent Us, Antifa, and the Floyd rioters . . .
